title: Wupatki National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       Welcome to Wupatki! Northern Arizona is a land of incredible beauty and diversity. While you're here, we want to make sure you have everything you need to make memories that will last a lifetime. Whether you want to explore the pueblos, picnic among pinyon pines, watch birds, or do all the above, this page is a great place to start.        For operating hours, entry fees, weather information, and pet policies, don't miss our Basic Information page. Maps and driving instructions are available under Directions & Transportation. Eating & Sleeping will tell you where to find snacks, picnic areas, lodging, and camping. Learn about the different pueblos and the visitor center at Places to Go. Don't forget about Safety. Drink water, stay cool, and give wildlife plenty of space.         NPS Image
